snippet: United Technologies said on Thursday that it planned to sell about $3 billion worth of assets to help pay for the company's $16.5 billion takeover of the Goodrich Corporation.
abstract: United Technologies said on Thursday that it planned to sell about $3 billion worth of assets to help pay for the company's $16.5 billion takeover of the Goodrich Corporation.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: United Technologies Prepares $3 Billion in Asset Sales
